page.title: 20CROSSFIELD FARM
page.content: 4 storage tanks are on the farm.One contains 400 tons of silage,one tank contains 60 tons of corn and two other tanks that hold 100 tons of barley each.At one time the farm had three horses to plough the fields but tractors soon put them out of action.Pigs are also kept at one time,as well as dairy cattle.Roughmoor has now taken over the dairy side of the farm. The land belonging to Crossfield borders on the Enmore Golf Course which is a large land user in the rural area.It is an 18 hole course,the size 6,442 yards.The club moved from Cannington.There are 670 full members. The average number of players a week is 400.It costs Â£125 to join and Â£136 subscription.The club costs Â£1600 a week to run and 9 people work fulltime with 4 people working parttime.
